frontmatter.title: My Approach to do Unit Test in React

node.excerpt: Starting with test is not easy, but if you are trying to do TDD while improving your code quality and/or speed it's a must. Having a test discipline doesn't make you a faster developer but it helps a…
The first thing you hear about TDD/BDD is this: Write a failing acceptance/feature test. Write a failing unit test. Make the unit test pass. Refactor your code. Repeat step 2,3,4 until acceptance…
